document.full_text: ten years ago, bathers in the james river, which wends through richmond, va., wore ear and nose plugs to stave off infections from sewage runoff. now, the river is stalked by blue herons and shad.
document.title: signs of an urban river's revival in virginia
lines_and_colors: ten years ago, bathers in the james river, which wends through richmond, va., wore ear and nose plugs to stave off infections from sewage runoff. now, the river is stalked by blue herons and shad.
